ActJudges Act
SubjectJudith MacLean ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Lawrence D. MacLean
PrecisGranting of an annuity to JUDITH MACLEAN, widow of the Honourable Lawrence D. MacLean, a Justice of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta, effective April 19, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
